mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS_CRT_PBI( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, SUB_REPORT_TYPE, SUB_REPORT_TYPE_COST, TREAT_RESULT, TREAT_ERROR_CODE, ERROR_MESSAGE, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{subReportType}, #{subReportTypeCost}, #{treatResult}, #{treatErrorCode}, #{errorMessage}, #{appId} )
